alert.note: Alert for Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:23AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL SCHLEICHER AND NORTHEASTERN SUTTON COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM CDT... At 423 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864, or 14 miles southeast of Eldorado, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 408 and 421. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
